author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

The output format is similar to "edmEventSize -v". For motivation see discussion in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/49640#issuecomment-3749106994

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1801

#### PR validation:

Private tests
title: Add `--average` option to `edmRNTupleTempStorage`
